  • Constructor Details

    • Table

      public Table(Filling[] symbols, int numberOfUsedSymbols, int seed, int bottleSize)
      Creates a Table object
      Parameters:
      symbols - a symbol array with the symbols to be used in the bottles of the Table
      numberOfUsedSymbols - the number of different symbols that can be used from the symbols array
      seed - the seed to create the Random generator that will generate the Fillings for the Table bottles
      bottleSize - the size of the Table bottles

  • Method Details

    • regenerateTable

      public void regenerateTable()
      Creates new Bottles for the current Table

    • singleFilling

      public boolean singleFilling(int x)
      Checks if the Bottle in the given index is singleFilling
      Parameters:
      x - the index of the Bottle to check
      Returns:
      true if the Bottle is filled with only one type of Filling otherwise false

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty(int x)
      Checks if the Bottle in the given index is empty
      Parameters:
      x - the index of the Bottle to check
      Returns:
      true if the Bottle is empty otherwise false

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull(int x)
      Checks if the Bottle in the given index is full
      Parameters:
      x - the index of the Bottle to check
      Returns:
      true if the Bottle is full otherwise false

    • areAllFilled

      public boolean areAllFilled()
      Checks if all the Table Bottles are filled and have only one content
      Returns:
      true if all the not empty bottles are filled with only one type of content otherwise false

    • pourFromTo

      public void pourFromTo(int i, int j)
      Pours the Filling on top of a Bottle to another
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the Bottle where to pour from
      j - the index of the Bottle where to pour to

      Parameters:

      Gets the bottle size being used in the Table
